responseText:
The temperature in the room rises as the gem settles into the empty space. The stele in the engraving begin to glow with a pale, spreading light that traces out a series of arteries throughout the image of the mountain.

You sense a new presence in the room with you, and begin to understand that this illustrates the network of aqueducts that drives the workings of the entire Mountainhall. You have a strong impression that someone wants you to know that this is important.

As the chamber cools, the gemstone fades out of being.
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_0008_AwakenEmberthane_4_Response
